DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the feasibility of a newborn screen assay for Pompe disease
DOC.brief_title: Newborn Screening Assay of Pompe's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: DBS from newborn will be tested for acid alpha-glucosidase (GAA) activity. Babies with low GAA activity will be confirmed for Pompe disease.
DOC.criteria: newborns receiving newborn screening in Newborn Screening center of National Taiwan Univeristy Hospital parents signed inform consent for this study
